What needs to be said is that the numbers for """"whites"""" being killed by police are somewhat skewed. Hispanics often times in the US census are counted as white. There's no mass epidemic of whites being killed by police if there were then talks of gun and police reform would be at a national level and laws would be enacted very quickly. These are Hispanics being killed.

A few important things to note: A) Milwaukee may not have been as cold. Considering Indianapolis was predicted to be colder than Chicago. B) it's not just about kids standing outside but the fact that buses don't or won't start. That's an issue C) you said global warming aside. What the hell does that mean? I'm assuming your comment was meant to refer to the fact that it is a myth because it's so very cold. If that's the case then that's sad. It's sad because if you knew anything about global warming you would know that it would mean hotter in summer, colder in winter. D) this guy is a lawyer so I'm assuming he'd be first in line with a lawsuit against the school because his little Timmy got too cold.
It turns out that every time they criticize trump for lying what he's says happens to be true.

My neighbor (in an apartment) used to up the scentsy products and I had to call an ambulance. I have asthma and COPD. I've taught her to use a wax heater with soy wax and essential oils. Her apartment smells nice and I stay out of the ER and morgue.
